Pre-Game Insights: India will face Ireland in New York on June 5, 2024, at 8 PM IST.
India will face arch-rivals Pakistan in New York on June 9, 2024, at 8 PM IST.
India will play against the USA in New York on June 12, 2024, at 8 PM IST.
India will face Canada in Florida on June 15, 2024, at 8 PM IST.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The ICC T20 World Cup 2024 is historic, expanding to feature 20 teams, up from the previous 16.
The tournament will feature 55 matches, offering a cricketing feast for fans.
The United States will host matches across three iconic venues: Florida, New York, and Texas.
Six nations within the West Indies will also serve as hosts: Antigua & Barbuda, Barbados, Guyana, Saint Lucia, St. Vincent and the Grenadines, and Trinidad & Tobago.
Others: The ICC T20 World Cup 2024 promises to be an unforgettable event, celebrating the spirit of cricket and showcasing the best talent from around the globe.
